title: Emergency Pod: Sarver To Sell The Suns
description:
Brian Windhorst is joined by Andscape’s Marc J. Spears and ESPN’s Ramona Shelburne to react to Robert Sarver announcing his intention to sell the Phoenix Suns & Mercury and the implications across the NBA.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
